title: Chubby Rain
description: The aliens come to Earth in raindrops. Chubby rain. They begin replacing people’s guts with alien hardware and the planet’s last hope is Keith Kincaid.
altHero: Kit Ramsey looks up at the sky with wide arms and gritted teeth
alt1: Kit Ramsey and Daisy are held up at gunpoint
alt3: Kit Ramsey is nervous in a dark parking garage
alt4: Afrim as a police officer whose face has started melting
